extendedInfo.description: Circle of Death is an extremely fun and entertaining drinking game to play. Each player takes turns around the table drawing a card and then following the rule for each card. This app will provide countless hours of fun and is guaranteed to be a hit at the next party.Keywords: Kings Cup, Waterfall, Circle of Death, Drinking, Game, College, Party, Fun, Cards

reviews.title: I\'ll drink to that
reviews.comment: I downloaded because I liked the picture but it was fun too.
reviews.author: A Google User
